about_the_game:
WHAT IS WASTED...
WASTED Will Be Brutal is a Survival Open World PVE/PVP videogame that we are developing with the Unreal Engine 5 graphics engine for Windows compatible PC platform, you can play in singleplayer or multiplayer mode.

Immerse yourself in your protagonist and try to survive a multitude of adversities.
You will have to orient yourself without interactive markers, with only the help of a drawn map and a compass. Search for food and water, protect yourself from impassable weather conditions, avoid contaminated and radioactive areas, flee from wild animals, hide from local militia and other players who want to kill you, shoot down aberrant creatures, find shelter by settling in some abandoned building, or build your modular base by cutting down trees, mining rocks and retrieving resources throughout the vast areas of the game map, complete a multitude of quests to access special equipment and advanced resources!

THE STORY..
Year 2040, a remote island in the ocean hides a dark secret: a mysterious paramilitary society, known only as Memento, has established its research outpost in this seemingly inaccessible place. Here, among dense forests and craggy mountains, they conduct horrific experiments on a group of young boys.

The island, in itself, is an enigma. Navigating the stormy waters and overcoming the dangerous currents is a daunting task, but the members of Memento have proven to possess resources and technologies unknown to the outside world. Their goal is to conceal their aberrant activity at any cost.

The young people involved in the experiments are barely teenagers who have disappeared from different parts of the world without a trace. Transported to the island against their will, they are imprisoned in a labyrinth of laboratories, cells and underground facilities. Trained and subjected to genetic enhancement experiments, Memento seeks to perfect his prototype super soldier.

One of these young people, our protagonist, has almost run out of time; the organization will try to suppress him but he will discover in himself hidden powers and the strength to resist. Together with other survivors, he will form an indelible connection, deciding to fight for their freedom and reveal to the world the horrors hidden on the island.

The story will unfold with adventure, intrigue and action as our survivor and his group try to escape capture, unravel the truth about the secret society and find a way to stop the nefarious experiments forever. However, Memento will not be the only threat they will face, as the island itself will seem to react to their presence, revealing ancient and dangerous mysteries dating back to ancient times.

Memento will test the determination of the protagonists and lead them to unveil a dark reality in which the struggle for survival will mingle with the search for freedom and justice.


WHAT WE HAVE ALREADY IMPLEMENTED IN WASTED:
• Languages currently available: English (Text and Audio)
• Female protagonist with customizable appearance.
• Replaceable clothing: shirts, jackets, shoes, boots, tactical vests, protective suites, armor, helmets, backpacks with different carrying capacities.
• Advanced locomotion of the protagonist: walking, running, sprinting, climbing.
• Basic health statistics: hunger, thirst, life, stamina, bleeding.
• Multitude of missions with rewards, playable in single player, multiplayer, solo or team.
• Firearms with different characteristics: pistols, assault rifles, 12-gauge shotguns.
• Interchangeable weapon accessories: simple sights, variable optics, silencers.
• AI NPCs with advanced human locomotion: Militia, Survivors, Zombies, Mutants.
• Modular Base Building, wooden buildings.
• Landscape of 256km2 divided between sea and land.
• Different types of environments divided between: beaches, forests, grasslands, crops, snow-capped mountains.
• Varied foliage: trees, grass, bushes, flowers, rocks.
• Dynamic weather conditions: sunny, rainy, cloudy, foggy.
• Foliage dynamism respecting wind physics, direction and intensity.
• Advanced projectile physics.
• Dynamic Swimming.


FEATURES THAT WE WOULD LIKE TO IMPLEMENT:
• Text translation in French, Spanish, German, Polish, Italian.
• Male protagonist with customizable appearance.
• Advanced Base Building (concrete buildings, metal, etc...).
• Vehicles with realistic damage: pickups, SUVs, off-road 4x4s.
• Wide range of firearms with different characteristics: machine guns, snipers, explosives.
• Exclusive environments even more immersive and realistic.
• Advanced bullet physics for penetration, wind influence and gravity.
• Missions, missions and more missions to play alone or in teams!


SOCIAL

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains gory horror scenes, gory content, and violent deaths. It is not recommended for use by particularly sensitive people.

  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce RTX 3060Ti 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 6700XT 16GB / Intel ARC A780 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD + Set Maximum Windows Virtual Memory 32000
